title: Inevitable Havoc
description: If you read Destined Havoc and are waiting for the rest of Havoc's story, the book is now titled HAVOC and can be found HERE on Goodreads. Havoc will contain his entire story and will now be book #8 in the Storm MC Series with a release date of March 8th, 2016.*Havoc will be a stand alone biker romance. You do not need to have read any other books in the series to read this one.*
author: Nina Levine
